name: Typing Tutor
description:
A Typing Tutorial Program,

Letters fall from the top, try to press them as accurately and quickly as you can, a great way to learn and practice touch typing.

Use enter and arrow keys to navigate menus,

This game is in Beta, any feedback is welcome

Credit to Ray Meadows for use of "RM Typeriter old" Font (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/3.0/)
